page.title: 04QUERNMORE'S SHEEPDOG HANDLER
page.content: It takes Mr.Longton two or three years to train a puppy up to a good standard but the time depends on the dog.You have to be very patient and firm.It is important to choose one you really like as you will spend many hours with it. Mr.Longton's father won the English National many years ago,his son has won several trials including the Windermere Trial and his grandson Brian Dodd is keeping up the tradition. He was chosen to represent England in the junior section of the One man and his dog series,on BBC TV. At the moment Mr. Longton has about 50 cups and trophies in his front room and his wife is kept very busy polishing them.
